issue.title: buildings not showing up in MapQuery

content.raw:
Thanks for the code and script. I believe your problem is:

1. The buildings were outside your search area

2. `complete_10.world` uses `terrain_model_1.sdf` not `terrain_camp_roberts.world`.

I've moved your code into pull request #75. Take a look at that pull request and [this tutorial](#!/osrf/swarm/wiki/Tutorial_11-Terrain_test_plugin). Let us know if something still looks wrong.
content.html:
Thanks for the code and script. I believe your problem is:

  1. The buildings were outside your search area

  2. complete_10.world uses terrain_model_1.sdf not terrain_camp_roberts.world.

I've moved your code into pull request #75. Take a look at that pull request and this tutorial. Let us know if something still looks wrong.
